pageContent: Background: Prostate cancer screening is studied in a randomized trial in Antwerp, Belgium. The case group receives three screening tests (DRE, TRUS, and PSA). Intermediate evaluation shows that only 1/3 of the biopsy results is positive (35/125). The proposed analysis identifies variables that determine the biopsy outcome.

metaData.source:
Large scale genomic instability as an additive prognostic marker in early prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/19633362/
